storyInfo: A Rhodes Island cafeteria operator wishes to go to Siracusa to see a concert, but Lunacub is the only one available to guide him.

attributes.content: Argh...
attributes.name: Mafioso F

attributes.content: What's the matter with you? You telling me a little kid in the city with a bow and arrow is giving you trouble—
attributes.name: Mafioso G

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Gah! My knee!
attributes.name: Mafioso G

attributes.content: Run boys, run!
attributes.name: Mafioso G

attributes.content: You can come out now, Measuring Cup. They're gone.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Are you okay? Did you get hurt?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: N-No, I'm fine. Thanks...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Good. I'm the pack leader for now, so I can't let someone like you who can't fight go in front.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: But... there was need to fight in the first place.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Those city wolves thought we'd be easy prey. All I did was draw my bow, but I hadn't even fired before they all came running over.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Drawing your bow on a bunch of gangsters who wouldn't think twice about killing you... Isn't that a bit reckless?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: When you run into danger, you bare your fangs. Isn't that the basics of self-defense? What do you think, Agnese?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Besides, they weren't strong. If we were in the wilds, I could have handled them on my own, easy.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: *sigh* Though you're the one who provoked them, you did take care of it on your own, so I guess I can't complain. We should get back to town before we miss our truck.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Back to town?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Well, yes. We've already paid for our tickets, and if we don't get back soon we won't be able to board—
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Hey, that's our convoy! They're coming this way! Let's get on!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Sorry guys, this town's famiglia are our clients too, so—
attributes.name: Rapidly Approaching Voice

attributes.content: —We can't take you along this time.
attributes.name: Rapidly Fading Voice

attributes.content: They left?!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: What do we do now, Lunacub?!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: ...I dunno.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: You're not supposed to admit that!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Measuring Cup, you've been with us for a few years now, right? But you've never taken any days off.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: I feel like if I did, I'd have to ask someone to take over my work while I'm away, and I'd really rather not trouble anyone like that.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: You and your coworkers already manage the cafeteria together. Don't you cover for them when they take time off?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Still, asking them to help me is a bit...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: (Shrugs) Whatever. So why now, all of a sudden?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Th-This is totally different! This is an Emperor concert! I have all his albums! I've always wanted to go see him live!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: I've already run the numbers. If Rhodes Island maintains its current route, the concert in Nuova Volsinii will be closest!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Also, I promised everyone who's covering for me one of his vinyls...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: What? Aren't those expensive? And you promised one for everyone?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: I mean, they're doing my work for me. I've gotta show them my sincerity somehow...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: You... It wouldn't kill you to loosen up now and then, would it?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Okay, so you've already handed off your work... Oh, right, you're not Siracusan, are you?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: I'm not, but I did read five different Siracusan travel guides from cover to cover.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: It's a pretty chaotic place at the best of times. I'll go look for an operator familiar with the region. They can be your guide.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Oh, I wouldn't want to trouble anyone else. Why don't I just—
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Look, would you rather not trouble anyone, or would you rather get to see Emperor's concert?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: I, well... Thanks for going to the trouble...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Looks like the only person familiar with Siracusa who's onboard right now is Operator Lunacub. You two alright with that?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Oh, do you know each other already?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Is there anyone on the cafeteria management team who doesn't know her?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: What about you, Lunacub?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: I don't mind. I was getting bored waiting around Rhodes Island anyway.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: If you don't want her as your guide, you'll have to go to Siracusa by yourself. You think you can manage?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Honestly, if I hadn't been pressured into taking you as my guide back then, do you think I'd be sitting in that truck right now?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: I don't remember pressuring you into anything.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I meant the lady from HR. She went out of her way to find you, so if I'd refused, wouldn't that be letting her down?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Does not agreeing with her count as letting her down?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Err, I didn't mean it that way...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: *sigh* The travel guides never said what to do if I couldn't board a convoy...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: If you still want to go to Nuova Volsinii, we can follow their tracks.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: A convoy is different from a wolf pack. It has to stick to a road, and can't just go where it likes.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: There's nothing but sand next to the road though. Nothing to hunt either. Are you sure you want to walk?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: If the convoy always follows this route, we might be okay. Maybe we can hitchhike.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Hitchhike? It will be a hike, yes, but what are you hitching yourself to?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: It means when we see a car, we can ask for a ride.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: How much longer are you going to take, Measuring Cup? I'm starving.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Real soon, I promise! Just a little longer!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: (Muttering) If I factor in everything, it'll take us ten days to reach Nuova Volsinii, so I should divide our rations into ten...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: (Muttering) Definitely need to hide what's left over, can't let her find them...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Are you done yet?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: It's done, it's done!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Here, our meal for today.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: We've still got lots of rations, so why are we eating so little today?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: All our plans assumed we'd be on a convoy right now, not whatever this is... It's about a ten-day walk, so this is all we can spare for today.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Lunacub eats her own portion in a couple of bites, then walks in front of Measuring Cup and tears open the bundles he had just painstakingly wrapped.
He tenses up, afraid that she will find the rations he so carefully hid away, but after some rummaging, she takes some leather, their Rhodes Island uniforms, and a frame.
When he sees her setting up a tent by the fire, he breathes a sigh of relief.
(Muttering) Maybe I'm just a tad neurotic.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: I'll help set up the tent too, Lunacub—
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: My uniform?!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: And yours too?!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: I told you before we left that these clothes are too thick for this season.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Now that our plans have changed, the stuff you brought is actually pretty useful. It'd be a shame not to make a tent out of such high-quality fabric.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: But now that our uniforms are ruined, I'll need to write a report to explain this to Logistics when we get back...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Sounds like a pain. They wouldn't tell me where the supply rooms are, but I managed to find one that even they'd forgotten about.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Hey, are you going to help me with the tent or not?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: How are you feeling?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Great...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: You don't look great. Why hide it?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: The sun is scorching. I feel like I'm about to dry out... But if we stop to set up camp, we'll fall behind schedule.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: I was wondering what you were trying to do. Here.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Those things you call 'umbrellas' are pretty useful, so I made one from the tent frame and some fabric. Some parts were too complex though, so you can't fold it up without taking it apart.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Thanks—Hey, wait, this fabric... Is this my uniform?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Yes. You weren't using it, were you?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: True...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: (Muttering) One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight... We still have eight days worth of rations—
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Don't just stand there! A sandstorm's about to hit us! We need to move, quick!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: But the sky's still clear.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Don't you smell the sand in the air?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Watch out. The riverbed's flat, but there's a gloompincer nest down there. Stay close to me if you don't want to get pinched.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: How can you tell?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: The mud's a different color—Hey, watch out!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: You mumble a lot, but your food is so good.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I usually don't like how gloompincer meat smells funny, so I only risked catching this one so I wouldn't have to sleep on an empty stomach.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Well, I do work in the cafeteria, you know.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: (Muttering) One, two, three, four, five, six... There's still some gloompincer from yesterday, too. Good, good...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Counting your rations again?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Lunacub?!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: No need to hide them. I figured out which layer you wrapped them in a long time ago.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Thanks for leaving them alone...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Why do you say 'thanks' all the time? You always say you don't want to trouble him or her or whomever, but... that word alone is troubling enough.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: So stop thanking me and tell me about this 'hitchhiking.' Where is this car that's waiting for us?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: It's not waiting for us, we just need to encounter one... *sigh* It's been five days and we haven't seen a single car pass by. Our luck's just horrible.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: I saw some fresh tuskbeast dung, so there's probably a pack nearby. I can't tell if this is one I know, but where there's a pack, there's prey.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: We can follow the prey, wait until they head towards the closest city, then take a car from there back to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: But... Nuova Volsinii...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: You can't make it to the concert. But if you listen to me, you won't go hungry.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: ...But I still want to go!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Go and do what?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I took two whole months off to go to Nuova Volsinii! I can't just give up now!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Even if the concert is over, I still want to go! I want to go cry my heart out at the theater entrance! I want to buy the merchandise! I want to hear the last echoes of that once-in-a-lifetime experience!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Hmph, I guess it's only at times like these that you actually speak up.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Am I being too stubborn about this? I've been wondering that for a while now.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Why? Isn't it normal want to do what you want?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Well... I think a lot of people can't do that.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Now that you say it, people in the city do seem like that.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Only ever worrying about what other people think, without even asking, until you're too afraid to do anything. Even though no one's stopping you.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Or insisting you want to do something that's too much for you, so you and everyone else are just fed up with it afterwards.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Is this some kind of 'cunning'? Something you do so you don't go hungry when you can't catch any prey?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: *sobs*...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: What now?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: (Muttering) Your 'worrying about what others think' thing reminded me that I definitely need to get to Nuova Volsinii. I promised all my colleagues those vinyls...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: *sigh* I don't get you at all.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: That's fair, I don't really get me either...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Lunacub, your rations.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Lunacub?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Huh? Oh.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: You seem rather absent-minded. What's wrong?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: I can smell the tuskbeast pack.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Tuskbeast pack... Oh right, I remember hearing that you lived with a pack of beasts before you came to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: It must have been interesting going from that to the landship, and seeing all those unfamiliar things.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Eh, there were a lot of things I hadn't seen before, some good to eat, some fun to play with, but I don't like seeing a ceiling when I wake up.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: If Agnese hadn't asked me to wait there, I might just leave. Dunno when, though.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Agnese... Where is that friend of yours, anyway?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: That... It's annoying to explain. Agnese is right here, next to me.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Measuring Cup fears that he has somehow offended her and hastily tries to explain himself, but Lunacub does not react at all. She is staring with rapt attention at thin air. It is difficult to tell if she is looking at something near or far away.
As the bonfire crackles in the silence, Measuring Cup suddenly hears the howling of the tuskbeast pack, far in the distance.
Lunacub, are you... thinking of returning to the pack?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Huh? What did you say? I was listening to Agnese just now.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: ...Never mind.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: The tent's all set up. You can turn in early if you want to sleep.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: That pack of tuskbeasts is calling out again, but Lunacub wouldn't really go rejoin her old pack, right?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: *sigh* She's taught me so much these past few days. Guess I still can't get the upper hand...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: *siiiiigh* Why am I even thinking about this stuff...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: (Steady breathing)
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: (Yawn) What was that? Lunacub? Is something going on?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Lunacub? Lunacub!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Nobody's here?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Sh-She said... that where there are tuskbeasts, there's prey, so I just have to wait here...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Who cares what she told me? I need to check on the rations.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: They're all gone?!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: A trail of footprints leaves the west side of camp, a perfect fit for Lunacub's shoes.
In desperation, Measuring Cup grabs the cooking pot by the fire. Then, fearing it won't be enough, also snatches a large fork before hurriedly following the footprints.
*pant* *pant* *pant* ...Lunacub! Lunacub, where are—
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Stay back!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: If you're going to run off without a word, you could have at least left me some rations.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: You idiot, how am I supposed to lure sandbeasts without bait? We won't always stumble over easy prey like those gloompincers.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: You didn't have to abandon me either—
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Stupid!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I'm not just hunting for myself, I'm hunting for the both of us—
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Do you want to die?!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: What's happening?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: It's fine if you want to help, just stop asking questions and come over here!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: A tuskbeast pack? I thought you guys were friends?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: I don't know every pack in the Siracusan wilds. They couldn't catch any sandbeasts on their own, so now they're here to snatch someone else's prey. Hmph.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Well... Can you talk things out?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: What's there to talk about? There's only one sandbeast. Either we eat, or they eat. Do you want to go hungry?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I... I was just wondering if we could come to a peaceful resolution.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: You'll starve to death if you keep thinking like that!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I thought you left that blind consideration behind when you talked about the concert. If we don't eat that sandbeast, we both starve. And if we starve, then you're missing the concert!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Can you walk? They'll close in on us soon. If you're gonna run, you'd better run soon!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: (Deep breath) I-I-I'm not going to run!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Good. You don't need to go anywhere, just stand here. When I yell 'hit it,' then hit that pot as hard as you can!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Hit... the pot?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: I'm the pack leader, so listen to me! You need to scare them! Scare them bad! If the pack wins, we lose! There's no 'peaceful resolution' here! If you don't fight for what's yours, nobody is going to just give it to you!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Will you do it or not?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: ...Alright!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup
Lunacub
attributes.content: Okay...

attributes.name: Lunacub
attributes.content: Hit it!
The sound of thick metal clashing against metal resounds through the woods, distracting the tuskbeasts who have never heard such a sound before and stopping them in their tracks.
Got you now!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Hit it again!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Again! Harder!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: After three rings of the pot, three tuskbeasts fall to the ground, pierced by arrows.
The next time I say 'hit it', I need you to hit that pot as hard as you can and for as many times as your arms can handle! The harder and faster, the better!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: HIT IT!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: The tuskbeast pack is pushed back by a barrage of chaos. The raucous din of clanging metal overlays the volleys of arrows being fired wildly, all while their fellows drop to the ground one by one.
In the end, the matriarch of the pack cries out twice, and they quickly retreat into the forest.
They're gone. We should get this sandbeast back to our camp as soon as we can.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: I've got a question, and maybe this is insensitive, but those tuskbeasts you killed, couldn't we also...?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Heh, so you've finally stopped mincing words like a city person. I don't know how useful that is in the city but here in the wild, it's best to just get to the point.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: But forget about those tuskbeasts. I'd rather not start a feud with them if we don't need to.
attributes.name: Lunacub
Lunacub
attributes.content: You were a big help just now, but you were still pretty wimpy. I'd say the only—

attributes.name: Lunacub
attributes.content: Yeowch! That's hot!
(Chewing) The only thing I can't complain about is your cooking.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: (Muttering) And after I played such a big part...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: What did you say?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I said I played a big part earlier!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Hmph. I guess so, otherwise all you'd be getting are the claws.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: And how's that fair? Even if I didn't go and help, I'd still be the one cooking it for you!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Well, who asked you to starve me every day?! Even if we're in a rush, a handful of rations is way too little!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: The only reason we even have a handful of rations left is because of my planning!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: So you've finally learned to speak your mind?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Huh? I... I guess I have.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Good! I'm not a mind reader. I'll only know what you're thinking if you tell me.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: If you keep hiding things away instead, I'm going to forget all the good things you've done.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Then I'd like you to be honest with me. How much do you think I've helped out during our trip?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Lunacub does not answer, using a small knife to carve up a sandbeast haunch instead. The meat sizzles atop the grill for a while before a piece is given to Measuring Cup.
What should we do once we finish eating? Do we need to move camp so that pack won't come back for us?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Wow, you only just learned to speak up and you've already learned to cover your tracks too? Very good.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Never mind what I learned, I actually feel like I'm... happier?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Happy? That's good too, right? If your stomach's full then it's normal to be happy. Maybe you'll be qualified to be part of my pack when we reach Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: 'Reach Nuova Volsinii'?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: *sobs*...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Now what?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: The concert... My concert...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Slow down! If you keep going this fast, you'll get tired before noon—
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Look, Lunacub! Isn't that a car stopped by the side of the road?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Hey, you two! What do you think you're doing, sneaking around my car like that—
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: Gah—
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: ...Isn't this the driver that took your 'payment' but still left us by the roadside? Is this that 'hitchhiking' thing you were talking about?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: (Shrugs) I suppose so.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Mister Driver, we're not going to ask for our money back. We'll be satisfied if you just take us to Nuova Volsinii, okay?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: I'd love to, but this lousy car of mine's broken down, and I can't repair it alone.
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: You're not alone. There are three of us.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: If you still can't, then give those pieces of paper back to Measuring Cup. We can walk.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Pieces of paper?
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: She means the fare we paid.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: ...Sure, why not? If you two can help me fix my car, I'll grit my teeth and take you to Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: Well, it should be fixed now.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Ah, no, no can do, my car here's got some quirks, see. You need to wait a while after opening up the hood, or it won't start up—
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: Sounds like it's working alright to me.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Oh, er, yeah. Looks like that went away all of a sudden.
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: We'd best get moving then. An hour saved is an hour saved! And the concert's tonight!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Hold on, isn't Nuova Volsinii supposed to be that way?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: It's a shortcut. Aren't you in a hurry? I'm taking us the fastest way I know.
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: Tch...
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: Measuring Cup, what's that sound?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: A communicator. Maybe there's someone nearby who's using one too, and their signal is interfering with this one.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: That's right! I'll speed up a bit, and we'll be there before you know it!
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: No. This isn't the way to Nuova Volsinii. Stop.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: We're almost there! You don't know what you're talking about, girl! Buddy, can't you keep that kid under control?
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: Buddy?
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: You're right. With the weather being this hot, we should get under some shade.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Ah, thanks. This umbrella of yours is real unique. Is it... made out of clothes?
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: Yeah, that girl over there made it. I've learned a lot of things from her. She even wants to be my pack leader, and honestly, I've been seriously considering the offer.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: I... I see.
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: Any particular piece of the sandbeast you want?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Nah, I'm good, I'm not really hungry—Hey, why're you covering my eyes?! The hell do you think you're pressing—
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: You got guts, Sante. Decided not to answer your comms?
attributes.name: Mafioso A's Voice

attributes.content: We ain't waiting no more. Whatever, we're nearly there. We'll help you fix your ride when we get there.
attributes.name: Mafioso B's Voice

attributes.content: When the car's fixed, you bring us to where you fobbed off those two stronzi who made a ruckus in the city. They can't have gotten far.
attributes.name: Mafioso B's Voice

attributes.content: Once we let off some steam with a few jabs of the knife, whatever they got on them is yours. We'll bump you joining the famiglia up the schedule, and soon you'll have your own driver you can boss around...
attributes.name: Mafioso B's Voice

attributes.content: Still thinking of a 'peaceful resolution'?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: (Shrugs) Let's give him one last chance, just in case he's stuck in a sticky situation.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Mister Sante, give us back our fare and get out of the car.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: (Clenching teeth) As if! Wait until the boys get here—
attributes.name: Driver

attributes.content: Sorry, but if you win, we lose. No peaceful resolution this time either.
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Measuring Cup kicks the driver—dazed from a cooking pot to the head—out of the car and straps himself into the driver's seat. The car burns a semicircle into the road and disappears in a cloud of dust.
See? It's like I said. In the wilds, if you don't fight for what's yours, nobody is just going to give it to you.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: So do you want to join my pack? I'm serious.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I'll think about it. But for now...
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Nuova Volsinii, here I come!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Em! Pe! Ror! Em! Pe! Ror! Em! Pe! Ror!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: I love you, Lunacub! We actually made it on time! You've been my lucky star this entire trip!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Ah... Right.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: You came all this way... just to see that guy?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Which guy? Who are you talking about?
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Who else? The one on stage.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: That's right! Have you never heard of Emperor? I've been a fan ever since I was in school! I even have all his vinyls! He—You know what, I'll tell you all about him after the concert!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Em! Pe! Ror! Em! Pe! Ror! Em! Pe! Ror!
attributes.name: Measuring Cup

attributes.content: Agnese, did Measuring Cup nearly get himself killed just to see this guy shouting on stage?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Couldn't you just have called him over before we left? Wouldn't Measuring Cup have been satisfied with him shouting at him then?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: ...You'll consider your goal achieved once I can understand why he did what he did?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Alright... Well, I don't get it at all yet. It's too noisy.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Emperor raps along to the rhythm on the stage, his fanatical fans shouting, shrieking, and swaying below.

Lunacub looks at Agnese in confusion as she stands by her side, then back to Agnese's kin upon the stage. She pushes her way through the crowd with a bewildered expression, and makes her way out of the theater.
